serveur.solo: \[[0-9][0-9]:[0-9][0-9]:[0-9][0-9]\] \[Server thread\/INFO\]: Starting integrated minecraft server version ([0-9]+\.*)*

files.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS files(id integer PRIMARY KEY, Name text UNIQUE, Date text, FileNumber integer)
files.insert: INSERT INTO files (Name, Date, FileNumber) VALUES(?,?,?)

lines.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS lines(id integer PRIMARY KEY, file_id integer, Date text, Serveur text, Type text, Time text, message text, FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES files (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE)
lines.insert: INSERT INTO lines (file_id, Date, Type, Time, message, Serveur) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?)

serveurs.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS serveurs(id integer PRIMARY KEY, server_id text UNIQUE, server_complete_id text UNIQUE
